alert.note: Alert for Gray; Haskell; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:30PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sublette, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sublette, Tice and Copeland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
